channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1507931502209691649
item.description:
Without a doubt, making a unified and open data standard for Covid information is probably one of the most important projects for the second decade of the 21st century.
I say that wearing my historian hat, looking back at the challenges of analyzing data from the past. https://t.co/rmdRWlSOeh

item.title: #und @ 1507828087756578823
item.description: #DatosAbiertos https://t.co/TUyT4YDn3a

item.title: #en @ 1507797436886138891
item.description:
According to Boston’s open data, here’s how many reports @BOS311 handled in the North End each year. Not sure what justifies a $7,500 fee when reports dropped over 25% from 2018 to 2021:
2016 ▶️ 5,445 2017 ▶️ 5,430 2018 ▶️ 6,158 2019 ▶️ 5,356 2020▶️ 3,805 2021 ▶️ 4,532 https://t.co/Xkq2vawawO

item.title: #en @ 1507792460558209031
item.description: @elonmusk Yes - a L1 blockchain based social network like @deso that has baked in pseudonyms, open source, open data, open algorithms. Lots of engineering challenges (basically decentralized Kafka Streams) but worth it for permanently securing speech freedom for all of humanity.

item.title: #und @ 1507740834569072644
item.description: @Rosario_Sasieta #OpenData 👆

item.title: #pt @ 1507730565616832515
item.description:
Quem aí tem usado o Portal de Dados Abertos do DF (https://t.co/2VhuLddZYU)?
Dei uma navegada e vi que a maioria das bases de dados é antiga.
Por exemplo, na Saúde, há bases de atendimentos e consultas e estoques de medicamentos de alto custo, mas referentes a 2017 e 2018.

item.title: #es @ 1507710993731833858
item.description:

Fuente: #DatosAbiertos al 24/03/2022 https://t.co/BBUG0v54CE https://t.co/QXKUyWW255

item.title: #es @ 1507697770366484482
item.description:
💡 ¿Lo subo a un repo de GitHub y hacemos un #hackathon?
Algo divertido, creativo… Y colectivo, juntando muchos cerebros. En comunidad.
🤓 Programadores 📈 Analistas de datos ✍️ Periodistas 💅 Diseñadores 👥 …
Para demostrar el valor de los datos abiertos.
¿Lo hacemos?

item.title: #fr @ 1507691076257202178
item.description: "Le rapport d'enquête ne sera pas public" A quand une obligation d'#opendata de tout ce que peut produire l'administration ou lorsque financé par de l'argent public ?

item.title: #de @ 1507681180992299014
item.description: Um es zusammenzufassen: Die IT ist dabei selten das Problem bei mehr Transparenz. Die zentral Frage ist, ob genug politischer Wille vorhanden ist, um z.B. das WiReg als #opendata bereitzustellen. Die Regierung muss sich entscheiden: #StandWithUkraine️ oder #StandWithRussia 14/

item.title: #de @ 1507681177242583046
item.description: Also bleibts bei auf österreichisch "kann man nix machen"? Nein! Die Verbesserung des Zugriffs auch auf öffentliche Register wie das WiReg in Richtung #opendata ist einer von vielen Bausteinen, um durch mehr Verwaltungstransparenz auch das Vertrauen in diese wieder zu stärken 12/

item.title: #de @ 1507681173308424193
item.description: Eine Freigabe der Rohdaten des WiReg als #OpenData über einen Bulk-Download oder zumindest eine leistungsstarke Schnittstelle/API würde den Nutzen des WiRegs massiv erhöhen - und sogar der Verwaltung Kosten sparen, weil nicht alle Funktionen selbst entwickelt werden müssten. 10/

item.title: #de @ 1507681169588080640
item.description: Wie könnte also eine mögliche Lösung aussehen? Im Vergabebereich gäbe es ein Best Practice Bsp, an der sich die Regierung orientieren könnte. Seit dem BVergG2018 müssen Rohdaten zu Ausschreibungen maschinenlesbar auch als #opendata publiziert werden (https://t.co/saRbTGScnD) 8/

item.title: #en @ 1507460772544212995
item.description:
Looking at inter-provincial migration today to Calgary, and how that can be visualized from the @cityofcalgary open data.
In a way, the map re-enforces what other charts tell us. Namely, that most of the locations people move to Calgary from is in Alberta and B.C. #yyc #dataviz https://t.co/DeKFG1mhk5

item.title: #fr @ 1507456151369125890
item.description:
Quant au suivi médical, cela m'interpelle; que signifie "virus réduit"
Qui contrôle? Firmes qui vont utiliser ce centre, sera-il INDEPENDANT, AUDITABLE et DONNEES PUBLIQUES?
Sinon sera comme le reste: poudre aux yeux et cadeaux aux copains de l'industrie au départ des impôts.

item.title: #es @ 1507391495191420928
item.description:

item.title: #es @ 1507157041059610628
item.description: No importa el tema que esté investigando o algo sobre lo que quiera documentarme más a profundidad: en este país no existen cifras, todo es "al ojo", tentativo, aproximado. Ni hablar de datos abiertos que sirvan. Si se halla, es un milagro de navidad adelantado.

item.title: #en @ 1507083563069493251
item.description: No more impact factor means less incentive to shop around for unearned prestige. Prestige comes from impactful science. Publication is easy, so quality counts. Open data, code, and modern publishing infrastructure = better meta-analysis. Publish everything = no file drawer.

item.title: #en @ 1507057633236336648
item.description: @elonmusk @muratpak No. All your content on-chain (open data). Use the same seed phrase to login into your preferred apps. Apps built on top of the @desoprotocol blockchain. Upon each login your content (post, followers, etc) is available in all your favorite apps. Welcome to decentralized social 🚀

item.title: #pt @ 1507052417304731648
item.description:
Em fevereiro, a @Prefeitura_Rio firmou acordo com a OKBR para receber apoio técnico na elaboração da Política de Dados Abertos (PDA) da cidade.
O acordo não envolve repasse de recursos e tem vigência de dois anos. Saiba mais: https://t.co/TLnb5nmVts https://t.co/2TfygmXBxn

item.title: #en @ 1507029698206961665
item.description: My #OpenData resolution was unanimously adopted, along with funding for a #goats demo in the Milwaukee County Parks, as well as my #PublicArt in Capital Projects file, which picked up several co-sponsors! This is #winning, and winning feels good.

item.title: #en @ 1507025378476494850
item.description: I *loved* this recent opinion piece in @Nature by @_HannahRitchie arguing how important open data from the @iea is, linking climate data and COVID data, and putting a number on the money involved. (The @IEA raises just $5 million by paywalling its data.) https://t.co/G5p2VuagfB

item.title: #en @ 1507025376412905483
item.description:
The @IEA is going to make it's data open source! Truly great news and congrats to @MaxCRoser and @_HannahRitchie from @OurWorldInData who have been campaigning a lot for this in my timeline!
I truly hope this will lead to open data soon, and preferably also open models. https://t.co/TcMnyDFbYS

The session is free & everyone's welcome!

item.title: #de @ 1506942740743000065
item.description:
Heute präsentieren wir am Spirgarten-Treffen 2022 zum Thema «OGD ❤ Geo» und zeigen dabei, dass sich Geodaten in der @stadtzuerich sehr einfach als #OpenData veröffentlichen lassen.
Und ein Plädoyer auf die Nutzung von #OpenStreetMap und #Wikidata darf nicht fehlen🙂 https://t.co/53ehCJhpuj

item.title: #en @ 1506938072914669568
item.description:
Thank you for your kind response, @EU_opendata! 🙂
This was already reported to @datosgob on 2020 — to no avail. Unfortunately, liberating the fully downloadable dataset and letting the stunt make national headlines seems to be the only way to move the Ministry into action. https://t.co/cRx40p7bVq https://t.co/30avijKYNz

item.title: #en @ 1506921664797413376
item.description: Editors & reviewers, please click the url to check that the data is open & there; only seconds of work. 🙏 Just came across a paper claimed to have #opendata. The OSF url was not public though & once given access I found no data file. 1/2

item.title: #en @ 1506919017222660101
item.description: @JaimeObregon Hi @JaimeObregon 👏 Thank you for noticing & sharing! Although the majority of data on our portal comes from data providers' platforms automatically, we are working on ways to improve the monitoring of datasets' quality. We'll get in touch with @datosgob about this issue 🙂

item.title: #fr @ 1506880995559149568
item.description: La Déclaration des droits de l'homme permet à chaque #citoyen de contrôler l'administration. Pour cela, il faut pouvoir accéder aux documents administratifs. L'#opendata généralisée est un enjeu démocratique. #AnticorPropose #Présidenceéthique ➡️ https://t.co/vQdd7Ao7um https://t.co/doJ7wxM4Lo
